name: Twist Stack: Music Ball Hit
description:
Sounds easy? In your dreams !!
Colorful and Musical Twist plates block the descent of your marble, so like a brick, it destroys them. But if you hit a black plaque, all is over! Your ball is reduced to crumbs and you have to start your descent again from the beginning.
But even the black plates are not the weight against the fireball that falls at full speed! Choose your strategy: go crazy or stop and wait for your next opportunity to roll and jump. The other game of balls are green with envy!

What makes Stack Ball the best:
- A crazy speed
- A very fun gameplay
- Dynamic and bright graphics
- Simple and easy to play
- Great for killing time


• Ultra Stack Ball Is The Unique Twist Game For TAP TAP TAP ......... Action Lover.
• In The Game Break The Colourfull Tower With The Stack Ball At The Top Of Tower.
• When Tappimg Action Continuously Happen The Stack Ball Change Into The Fire Ball
• It's The Thriller Part Of The Stage.
• The Various Stages Of The Tower With The Various Shapes Of Mini Platform Stages
What`s New :
• Twist Music and Musical Game Play.
• Tap Tap Tap Tap & Play.
• Easy And Thriller Control On Tower With Tapping Action.
• Very Unique Game Mechanics With Various Shapes Of Tower.
• Suitable For All Age People.
• Ultra Stack Ball Has Various Attractive Colorful Background.
• Melodious Sound Effect At Smashing Tower Element.
• Bug Fix
